verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: a slew of false or misleading claims] [ARGM-TMP: during an appearance on " Fox and Friends " that morphed into a news conference on Friday] .
President Donald Trump made a slew of false or misleading claims during [ARG1: an appearance on " Fox and Friends "] [R-ARG1: that] [V: morphed] [ARG2: into a news conference] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] .
